website_summaries.verdict: This commercial-grade product is a fantastic option for customers seeking a heavy-duty clothing rack.
pros: Includes 3 storage shelves and 2 hanging racks
Weight capacity can hold up to 400 pounds
cons: Many customers had issues with assembly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of clothes and this outdoor closet is sturdy and perfectly sized for all of my stuff. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Krutz

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It is actually bigger than what i thought it would be. You could adjust the height of your shelves and the bar! Firm and sturdy. I like to dry my delicate jackets and dress shirt in the sun instead of throwing em in the dryer. This is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Wei

customer_reviews.title: Bingo, bango, done!
customer_reviews.text: My closet bar and shelf collapsed and I had a mess. After researching all my options, I chose this and am very pleased. It holds a load of clothes and is a great replacement for what I had... kinda glad the old ugly stuff bit the dust. The only problem I had was that I assembled it outside the closet and the door wasn't tall enough to just roll it in, so I had to tip it to put it in place. I am 65 and female and did all this myself. I am so happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kidle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, East to assemble, customizable!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that could hold all of my clothes without breaking or falling apart and this does the trick! I live in a bonus room without a closet, so I needed something that could stand up to constant every day use. I looked everywhere for something that was decently priced and was very sturdy and this 100% fit the bill. I love how it is versatile because you can change the height of both the bottom and the top rack and the hanging pole can be moved forwards or backwards. As someone who doesnt have any skills or experience assembling things, this had great directions and was easy to do. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for laundry room.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our laundry room so we would have a place to hang the clothes when they come out of the dryer. It's a perfect fit and is not in the way of the doors. The only note to make is that the middle shelf has to go higher if wanting to use it for hanging clothes. I threw a few things on it to show in the pictures. We had it assembled in about 10 minutes. Very pleased with the product! And just a note: I paid for this product and was not asked to give a review.
customer_reviews.author: Slmetcalftx

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for clothes organizer as I am moving to apartment with less storage and found this one. It’s sturdy and wonderful, the one I am looking for. It’s big enough to hold all my clothes. It took around 20 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: VKT

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty, sturdy clothes rack - extremely pleased with it!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for lots of other units before buying and i am so glad i decided on this one! It's heavy-duty enough that i can hang many of my super large clothes and it holds them without any problem at all. I believe i have more clothes hanging on this unit than can fit in several of my smaller closets. Most surprising is how tall it is - i know i looked at the dimensions before purchasing, but i was still surprised - it just seems larger than I expected and holds a ton of clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put toghether; holds all my clothing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product. It was so easy to assemble, and I have no skills with building things. It holds all of my clothes, and more! Very sturdy, looks great! Absolutely worth the price. So much better than anything I have seen in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Hold lots of clothes
customer_reviews.text: I needed more hanger space and this is perfect. Holds lots of clothes and has great storage with the wire racks. I took off the wheels because I didn't want it rolling around or didn't need the extra height. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mbapril13

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra closet space without the cost of getting more "built in" storage for my closet.... this is working perfectly. It seems sturdy, I'm using every inch of it and it hasn't collapsed... I've even been able to roll it out of the way when needed. My hubby was sceptical but loving it now. My mess is off the floor, off the chaise lounge and hanging up! Woo hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Holloway

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a small closet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & as described. Bought this for my son's room which doesn't have a real closet. Works great holds his shirts, jeans & shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mechele

customer_reviews.title: Great garment rack
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Recommend it to everyone. It was super easy to put assemble, and I did it myself. I haven’t put the actual garment rack to hang the clothes yet, but everything seems pretty easy. Super durable, and it’s a really good Size. I got it more for storage, and it’s working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Alizabel

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases EVER
customer_reviews.text: This unit is fantastic! It's super sturdy, was easily assembled, shelves and rods are adjustable so you can put them where you like. I didn't want to pay very much, but I'm so glad I chose this cuz it was worth it. I included a few photos. I have a very odd and inconvenient closet space and this was a perfect solution. I wanted to point out one very fortuitous thing...I only had a few long things that needed hung but since I bought the two bar model I thought I wouldn't be able to...but look closely at the photos, the way the rack is designed it has holes along the front and I used them for those few things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 shelving units. Really easy to assemble and maneuver. There’s plenty on storage space and the shelves are somewhat customizable. Since my clothes are smaller I can allow space under the bottom shelf for extra storage. Nice and tall, comes with side hooks for hats for belts. You’re able to choose where you place them. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anita J

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. Rolls easily. Fits perfectly into my closet.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisK

customer_reviews.title: Hold so many clothes, sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best one I have had yet. It holds so many clothes ,Its sturdy and very easy to put together. It also has hooks on each sides for belts , scarfs, jackets what ever you want to use them for. I went from a walk in closet to this. And I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany schaffner

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and awesome. Has leather bags
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and awesome. Has leather bags, shoes, heavy winter coats and clothes. I am very impressed. Absolutely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Marie marie

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my son's closet!
customer_reviews.text: the shelves in son's closet were falling apart. i was considering just putting 2 bar across and call it day... but i also wanted shelves, but didn't want to deal with drilling, and inserting drywall mounts, etc... also the bottom shelf keeps longer clothes off the floor another benefit i didn't realize... as my son grows taller, i can adjust the height of the bars. worked great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Caballes

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger and sturdier than another one I had bought on Amazon previously, it doesn't seem to have any plastic parts in it that broke like on the old one. I do kind of wish it had another shelf option to store more boxes or containers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great for storage and organizing
customer_reviews.text: This rack is very easy to assemble even for someone like me who never assembled anything. it is made of quality metal and it is so big that I can store lots of clothes and boxes in it. Now I have extra storage to organize my bedroom. The wheels can be easily locked. it arrived very fast once ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Leon F

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and no damage to the pieces. All pieces included. Easy to put together - tool maybe half an hour. Nice looking. I also bought the Homfa foldable canvas storage boxes to use with it. They fit the shelves just fine though they are tall so I won’t be able to hang clothing directly above them - which is fine for me. I haven’t loaded it yet and I have some concern that it may topple so I’m considering a safety attachment to the wall. Overall very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clothing rack ! Exactly what I was looking for. It fits a lot of clothes was very easy to assemble and it’s actually really sturdy ! I love that the rack has roles so you can easy transport it if you want to move it! I love that you can put bags or hats on the side of it! So you can really put everything on it! Shoes bags clothes ! Thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose 🌹

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This clothes rack is definitely worth the money. I'm 76 and put it together by myself but only needed help for the top shelf because I'm short. This is perfect for a room that has no closet and holds quite a bit, pants, tops, jackets, shoes and purses. Im very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. My order did not come with 2 hangers. I received only one hanger. When i returned the item for a replacement, guess what? I got received the shelving with one rack again. Terrible and lazy that the order could not be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I received this the other day, went to piece it together and the parts were wrong. There are base poles and top poles and I received two sets of base poles and there is no way to screw them together. Very upset because we are moving and needed this ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: RachaelS

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term solution.
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the positive reviews I have to say this thing is a piece of junk. Definitely NOT heavy duty. The wire shelves are thin and bend easily. The clothing rods are just hanging from the shelf, they do not screw in making them shift around and can easily come off. As others have mentioned the brackets are plastic. The wheels are very cheap plastic as well. It will due for a temporary solution but i do not expect this will hold for one year. Luckily it was not missing any parts.
customer_reviews.author: SteveWfromCarlsbad

customer_reviews.title: BEST RACK I HAVE HAD!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple garden-variety racks from the box stores that fell apart fairly quickly, so decided to spend a little more and invest in something decent. This is a good solid rack and has a great capacity, as advertised, handling my many jackets and coats very easily. I had a little difficulty assembling it, but then I am not very handy mechanically, either. The written instructions were no help with the problem I encountered near the end, but were fine to that point, so went to the video provided here on Amazon and it cleared it up for me, no problem. I really like it and believe it will last a long time, probably indefinitely, highly-recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: synz4gyvn

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd expect from this style of shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece, everything you'd expect from this style of snap-grate-utility shelf. The under bar was the selling point for me, because I want to hang jackets as well as a cloth shelf for my t-shirts. I left off the wheels and it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Wong

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, box ripped, no damage! Easy to assemble, seems sturdy...only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: This item has been a life saver in my home
customer_reviews.author: kadeisha

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I went to put this together this weekend and now I have to purchase a box big enough to return it (the one it came in was damaged) because it was missing the four top rods. Very disappointed because I bought this thinking I was going to get organized and now my room is worse than I started because I threw the old rack out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and they work amazing for your closet storage!
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome in our new house. We built a steel house and forgot to put extra bracing in the closets for the rods and weight of the clothing... instead of worrying about the bars or closets falling out of walls I purchased 1 of these to check it's quality. I loved it so much I ordered 4 for our master bedroom closet, daughters closet and son's closet as well. There are 2 different styles this size available.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Thooft

customer_reviews.title: Fits in closets nicely
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Need 2 people to assemble Holds a lot of clothes Placed inside my closet after the builder grade bar fell apart Hope this can take the weight. So far so good! Set top clothing bar high so you can bring up bottom bar up a bit to hold pants.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. They are sturdy, hold a ton, and look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig and Jenna Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together, my husband and I assembled it. We are using it in our bedroom for my husband's shirts, and it really holds a lot! The wheels lock and it works great on carpet. Very sturdy, well worth the money!! It could stand to be about 4 inches taller, then there would be room on the shelves under the shirts to set things on.
customer_reviews.author: QueenCheryl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOOOOVE this!! It’s so amazing! Now I would say the only issue I had was assembling it, at the very beginning. I read the instructions but I would recommend to watch the video that’s on amazon because it comes with clips that you need to use, but the instructions on the paper doesn’t inform you on how the clips operate only the video does, so I did waste time on that. But everything else is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for apartments without closets :)
customer_reviews.text: Will make my closetless apartment much much nicer to live in. I assembled it by myself, which was tricky a few times, but definitely was possible to assemble alone. Feels pretty sturdy. I am happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Enjoying life in WI :)

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: This clothing rack was easy to put together and hold two closets full of clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot, Very Sturdy, Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment with my husband and we both have a lot of clothes (especially me). The closet wasn’t enough space, so I needed this. What I like: -Sturdy Materials -Easy Quick Assembly (no man needed..lol). Everything is labeled and I believe I didn’t need any tools..though I used a weight to kind of pound the shelves in place -Three shelves for storing things!! -Two extremely strong racks that hold a ton of clothes + heavy jackets -Side hooks for scarves, purses, etc -Enough space in between for dresses/long items to fit So I’m very happy! It holds everything you’d want, won’t break, easy to move, and such a space saver. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Holding plenty of heavy outdoor activity clothes as well as extra weight on top rack
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in 24 hours, easy to assemble, holding lots of heavy outdoor clothing and extra weight on the top. Worth the extra price as I have used less expensive and they fail.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tolkacz

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!!
customer_reviews.text: Hanging rod could use a few more centimeters clearance from the roof of the racks- the hoops from the hangers keep getting stuck when hanging. Annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: nantamco

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The height is great. Some of the other ones sold on amazon aren’t high enough to provide adequate storage in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lo

customer_reviews.title: Find a better one
customer_reviews.text: Some parts came chipped. Although it is a simple way to assemble it’s not necessarily “easy”. Shelves take some time to get perfectly even. Wheels are not that great ended up just taking them off to make the whole thing sturdier. I would go with a different shelving unit if I were you. It serves its purpose and I didn’t want the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: kaylannie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile product, sturdy , cannot speak so much on durability because only had them for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Robles

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely cannot say anything bad about this item! It replaced a smaller/cheaper version we bought and could not hold one rack of small sized clothes. This is one tough guy! Holds everything beautifully and then some -hooks on the sides and storage shelves on top middle and bottom. All adjustable to your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mamo

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but not for the cat.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. Also adjustable height for the middle shelf. The top shelf was a great attraction for my cat but once he got there the rungs were very uncomfortable and he couldn't get down! Quite traumatizing for him. Just a hint for cat owners. I put an attractive shower curtain all around and it look very nice in the bedroom. 4 stars because it is quite ugly for some environments. SB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is not made for an average hight person
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.11 - 6’ average builder guy and all my blazers, shirts touch and bend at the divider section. If you move the center shelf divider lower then whatever is at the bottom will touch the floor. They need to make extension bars to make it higher
customer_reviews.author: David Arcos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It fit perfectly in my walk in closet. It’s strong, sturdy and easy to put together. You can put a lot of clothes on the clothing rod. It has rollers on the bottom so you can roll it and locked it in place. I was very happy with this item and may even purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: BEST SHELF EVER!! Portable, sturdy, easy to assemble. I have bought 3 in the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelf but came bent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. However my shelf came delivered bent. Shelf is pretty sturdy and holds my most of my winter coats and other mischellaneous items. If you noticed the box has been dented don't open and have amazon pick up right away (exchange for replacement), as the shelf would have been most likely damaged as well. I hope that the manufacturers will include handles on the boxes in future for an easier carrying option.
customer_reviews.author: usf_girl426

customer_reviews.title: Industrial-looking double bar clothing rack. So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Clothes rack was easy to put together. Using it as a coat rack inside our back door since we don't have a closet. It's sturdy, as it's full of coats for every season. Looks nice, I like the industrial look it has. I didn't rate for durability since we just got it. Overall, very pleased with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Babler

customer_reviews.title: Once you purchase this you won’t need anything else to hold your clothes
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! I’ve been looking for something to hold my clothes and this rack is amazing very sturdy and durable I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Dorman

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these racks and have turned a previous third bedroom into a master closet - free from putting holes in the wall for adding hanger space. Our racks easily move around the room making cleaning the room much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jim17

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected, and very sturdy. It is adjustable and wheels work well.
customer_reviews.author: david conrad

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different double Roos closer system in my kids' room, but it was flimsy and falling apart. This is perfect. It's really sturdy and matches the other furniture. Now I don't have to worry about keeping their clothes and things off the floor. I especially love the side hooks and the option to customize it later
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this clothes rack. I've purchased others in the past but I have never found one this sturdy. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it wasn't the easiest to assemble. Once I realized it would work better assembling with two people, it didn't take very long. You don't have to worry about it wobbling or leaning. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TMcD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no cover available.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Wished I could obtain a garment cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Don A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT clothing unit for those without a closet!
customer_reviews.text: We have no closets in our new place and needed something sturdy to serve as a a closet. I ordered two units. One unit arrived a little bent but that is most likely due to shipping. I’ve had the units for a few months. I’ve noticed the lower clothing rail bending slightly but I do have quite the clothing load on it. I’d definitely recommend this unit. It can hold a heavy load and it easily movable and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great for using as additional closet space. Hold quite a bit of clothing and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: mldd

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I was looking for! Quality built very sturdy !
customer_reviews.author: kenneth cornetto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use. Used in garage for coats and outer ware.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Richards

customer_reviews.title: Be
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, well presented components. It was easy to assemble. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: src

customer_reviews.title: Assembly directions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly are incomplete. The directions missed the step for installing the bars for hanging clothes. I had to take it apart again, which resulted in almost entire item coming apart. Directions are also missing for hanging the side hooks. I returned the 2nd one for this reason. Took hours to complete this simple assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong.
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. Fits more clothes then my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Oni P

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and they look wonderful. This was exactly what I was looking for. You won’t be disappointed! Easy to move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erika B. Looney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price. It's very sturdy and able to hold a lot of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: cakegirl117

customer_reviews.title: Very nice & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack for my grand daughter and I am impressed with the quality. However, you do have to put it together but I had no problem putting it together with the instructions that they included. Very heavy duty & very good quality, I am totally satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Organization is where it’s At
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizational tool, my sister bought the first one as I spent some time in her home office as my bedroom and didn’t have a closet and now I purchased one for my efficiency apartment because the closet is way too small! Love the hooks on the end to hang towels and robe or keys and jewelry, depending where it is and what the main purpose is for, is how I decide what to use the extra hooks for. Today it’s in my kitchen behind my breakfast table being used as a clothes closet so the hooks are being used to hold belts and ties for my Sweetheart!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to store my art portfolios in my workspace and they were exactly the right size made my workspace a whole lot more efficient
customer_reviews.author: Martha Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: This shelving rack is easy and quick to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This shelving rack is easy and quick to assemble. The components are of good quality. The product overall seems durable and strong. I can store a large amount of clothing on the two racks. The hooks on the side provide additional ways to store purses, hats, belts, scarves.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving
customer_reviews.text: This shelving is very durable & can hold a lot. It can be difficult to assemble if the ceiling clearance is low. I have the shelf in my basement, so I had to do some maneuvering to avoid hitting the central air ducts while assembling it. Otherwise, I'm very satisfied with the quality & feel that it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W-S

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: No. The rack is crap and over price for the quality. I feel i wasted my money buying the wobbly and poor quality product. I should have just bought the same rack from homedepot and add hanging bars for my clothes
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Strong/Stable/love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this clothing shelving. This is my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and quick assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I purchased this to create more space for our clothing. It functions perfectly, without fear of structural failure. The hooks that come with it currently house handbags and belts, perfectly. If you need some extra closet space, consider this. Worth it and ridiculously easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Drealeeki

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so worth it. It holds all my clothes and then some. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Melsie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought it many months ago and it still works great. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Rack was easily assembled, very sturdy, perfect for my needs. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Penny carpenter

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was just a temp solution to a storage issue. WE plan to replace with a home built system that will better meet our needs. The shirts hit the floor when hanging from the bottom pole. the person using it is 6'3 so if you are 5'10 or under it will probably work much better.
customer_reviews.author: leslie b

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is easy for me to put it together. The wheel allows to move it around rooms. It is a good shelf for clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Closet hanging clothes rack It's tall enough to hang adult clothes.
customer_reviews.text: It's tall enough to hang adult clothes and the clothes rods are solid. That's the good news. The bad news is this product is not packaged for shipping. Parts inside box were loose and some plastic parts were broken. I was able to assemble rack with the 3 shelfs but did not have enough connectors for the side pieces with the hooks. This rack is not as sturdy as other wire rack shelving units I have purchased. The wire on shelfs is thinner and after assembly showed some flexing when pushed on. Do not load up anything heavy. I needed someplace to hang up my clothes so I decided to keep it but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: double check your access heights.
customer_reviews.text: This rack was much taller than expected. I just assumed it would fit under a roof frame, but it does not. It had to be tipped and placed on it's side to move to another t\room than assembled in. too bad, it is a nice rack!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I strongly recommend it. I would purchase it again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought by the picture but I like it
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together. Pretty tall so make sure you measure what height you need before buying
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I decided to purchase, and I’m so glad I did. The rack is very durable, rolls easily, wheel lock into place easily, and my husband had no issues putting it together. I’m happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: hope fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great overall product just wish the shelves were made of the same material these “utility” shelves tend to be. The metal they used for the shelves is not super high quality the rods are very thin and you can tell that it would bend or bow if you placed something heavy in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: izabella

customer_reviews.title: Best Clothing Rack I have found
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack. It is very sturdy and moves easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: The claps are hard to get to remain level, but overall I like it! I’m
customer_reviews.author: Mcsllew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. Works well to organize all our extra clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Roy and DJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made, talk, construct in intended space for use
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very efficient way to use space. It’s very tall, much more than the usual hanging racks, assemble it in the room where it is going to be used. A nice tight little wardrobe solution.
customer_reviews.author: Zay5775

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in about 30minutes and it keeps the laundry room organized!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Provides the closet she needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother to use as a closet and it provides plenty of space. Her shirts (size large) fit on both the top and bottom bar with ease. However, the shirts hanging do make the shelves non-accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage capacity added by this
customer_reviews.text: Like its size and side hooks. Don't like the hard wheels. They would be better if rubber or something so less harsh on hardwood floors. They are fine they just would be better is rubberized
customer_reviews.author: Duragear

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. It was so easy to assemble. Took less than an hour. Kinda worried about the sturdiness of one wheel where the plastic clip didn’t click correctly, but it’s really good. It’s pretty big and fits a lot of stuff :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Easy to assemble. Looks great. Can’t wait to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together even if you are alone BUT would have been easier at some points to have help but it is doable on your own. Holds a lot of cloths and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a walk in closet. It came in a long box packaged good and easy to install. It comes with easy to read/ understand instructions, once it was put together I realized it was taller than I had imagined but it looks great looks sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Arandae

customer_reviews.title: Closet shelves
customer_reviews.text: I only assembled this yesterday and it is not a one person job. Time will tell if this is sturdy. I did have to take the wheels off in order to put it in the closet. If you assemble outside the closet, it won't have the clearance to put in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Standridge

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product if you are not going to really move it around on the cheap casters
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product and opened the box, one of the shelves was destroyed. After further investigation you could see that pallet forks went through the side of the box it was then taped up and shipped anyway. I'm sure I could have had another one shipped but we urgently needed the shelves so I straightened them the best I could so that we could use it. They are definitely not as sturdy as previous similar shelving that I have bought. Casters are also very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: having only pictures to use as a guide but I am so happy with the stability and the strength of this shelving ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was concerned, having only pictures to use as a guide but I am so happy with the stability and the strength of this shelving unit. It certainly meets all our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: The rack is perfect for stashing out of season clothes. Assembly was easy and required no extra tools. I love the extra hooks on the side, and the shelves work well for storing shoes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KimberHutt

product_meta.title: Homdox 3 Shelves Wire Shelving Clothing Rolling Rack Heavy Duty Commercial Grade Garment Rack with Wheels and Side Hooks (One Pair Hook and Two Hanging Rods Gray)
feature_bullets: BEST ADJUSTABLE SHELVES - 3-Tier Large Organizing Clothes Hanging Rack with wheels, Side Hooks included.Adjustable leveling feet for your needs to store difference sized items.This durable shelving is The ideal storage solution for organizing your bedroom!

MAXIMUM LOAD UP TO - almost 400lbs, 133lbs per shelf.This type of rack is great for guests who need a place to hang and shelve clothing, as well as for use as a spare clothing closet, so don't worry about it will not load too much.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL HANGERS - there are 4 Types for your choice. Heavy duty garment rack with 1 or 2 clothes hanging bar and 1 or 2 side hanger for hanging coat, hat, bag, etc.Transform your bedroom, patio and laundry room into an organized and neat place.Self-assembly required, no tools needed.
CONVENIENT WHEELS - The garment has 4 convenient wheels, 2 of them are locked wheels.

GET TO KNOW US - We created Homdox with a single goal in mind: to make the smart life easier.That means starting with affordable, high-quality gear and ending with a commitment to 100% user satisfaction. After all, we're customers too.
